p: WN virus PCR was performed as described previously ( 31). Briefly, WN virus RNA was extracted from plasma, whole blood, serum and/or cerebral spinal fluid using NucliSENS easyMAG extractor (BioMérieux, Marcy l'Etoile, France). For the detection of WN virus lineages 1 and 2, a real-time TaqMan PCR with primers and probe located within the conserved WN virus 3′-noncoding region was used ( 32).
